alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Hudson; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Passaic; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:34PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, Passaic, Union, Bergen, Essex, Richmond and Rockland Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1033 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ringwood to Madison to Rocky Hill. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Paterson, Elizabeth, Passaic, Bayonne, Wayne, Plainfield, Bloomfield, Hackensack, Linden, Orange, Paramus, West Milford and Ridgewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.
